Comments_List: Practical, theoretical, ethical introduction to conducting field research

The textbook could be much better integrated into the classroom and there could be a more ongoing infrastructure for students to share and collaborate on projects rather than simply going off to research their own aspects of a language.
Claire is an excellent shepherd through the beginnings of field work, though.
Assignment expectations and deadlines could be clearer, but feedback was very helpful
Hard to say, if youre a linguistics major its definitely important to expose yourself to.

This is a great course for students who want to learn how to apply linguistics concepts to real-world situations and get to know friendly native speaker consultants and do work that has meaningful impact.
